hanzi-su-wiki:
誘

Значения

Приглашать, завлекать

Мнемоника

Заманивать покупателя сладкими, лучшими 秀 речами 言.

Варианты

诱

yòu
to entice; to tempt
чтобы побудить; соблазнять

誘誘RS
诱诱		guide, lead, lure, tempt

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 诱)
Ideographic: To use elegant 秀 words 言; 秀 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
誘惑 [ yòu huò ]: to entice; to lure; to induce; to attract
誘人 [ yòu rén ]: attractive; alluring; captivating; to attract; to captivate
誘發 [ yòu fā ]: to induce; to cause; to elicit; to trigger
誘導 [ yòu dǎo ]: to induce; to encourage; to provide guidance; (medicine, chemistry) induction
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 秀 [ xiù ] elegant, graceful, refined; flowing, luxuriant
heisig_chinese_memo: Salespeople try to use elegant words to entice people to buy things. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: entice, say, words, keitai, mouth, excel, wheat, cereal, fist, from
heisig_story: Words . . . excel. Compare beckon (Frame 702), to urge (Frame 300), seduce (Frame 90), and encourage (Frame 931) when choosing your connotation.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: entice, lead, tempt, invite, ask, call for, seduce, allure
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Entice, свинец, искушать, пригласить, спросить, призыв, соблазнять, привлекательность
koohiiStory1: Think of the smooth talker who EXCELS at using WORDS to entice women (including married women if it makes it easier to remember).
koohiiStory2: Word and Excel somehow manage to entice people to use them, despite their plethora of bugs.
jp_example_words:
勧誘(かんゆう): invitation, solicitation, canvassing, inducement, persuasion, encouragement
誘導(ゆうどう): guidance, leading, induction, introduction, incitement, inducement
誘惑(ゆうわく): temptation, allurement, lure
誘う(さそう): invite, call out
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You say to some grain and some stairs: I want to invite you to my place.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: So you do. You invite a stalk of grain and a set of stairs to your home.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You invited them to your home because your roommate was having a party and inviting a lot of youths (ゆう) over. You wanted to look cool, so you invited some grain and some stairs, the two coolest things you could think of.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Surprisingly, the youths were impressed and spent a long time trying to talk to them.
Ru_Meaning: entice, lead, tempt, invite, ask, call for, seduce, allure
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 諭 (さとす、ユ указание, наставление, наказ).
Ru_Radicals: 乃 (родительный падеж), 禾 (ость колоса), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese: yòu: (графема) учить, наставлять (кого-л.); соблазнять, завлекать, искушать, совращать, заманивать, переманивать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: with excellent (秀) words (言) you invite
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Elegant words can entice even the most stubborn of people.  Wine, cheese, a fancy dinner, and a smooth invitation is all it takes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to " show " sound. "Shuowen" takes " induction " as the or form of "㕗". "Said Wen": "㕗, Xiangxu Hu also. Congsi Congyi. Induction, or from words, show. Shi, or so. Yi, ancient prose." Meng Pengsheng thought that "㕗" means inducement, which means " induction. " under the guise of the word; "Wen said," in order to "㕗" as the lure of the " lure of this word," not necessarily reliable. (Refer to "The Source of Characters")

" Trap " means temptation, temptation. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Zhaogong Twenty Years": "Huahai Puppets have illnesses to lure young masters." Yinqueshan Han Bamboo Slips "Sun Bin Art of War." "Eight Formation" Jane 340: "If the (enemy) is strong, we can control it, and we must first kill it to lure it."

" Lure " said the guide, induction. "Er Ya. "Shi Guxia": "Induction, enter." "Yu Pian. Yanbu: "Induces, induces, and persuades." Such as "Shangshu. Daguo": "I want to Dahua, to lure me to my friends." Kong Chuan: "Therefore Dahua the world, Dao my friends of the princes." "The Analects. "Zihan": "The master is tempting and charming. He uses texts and asks me to be courteous. I can't stop it."

" Induced " also expressed touch. Such as "Huainanzi. Original Dao": "A hatred is formed, but knowing is tempted outside, not against oneself, and the law of heaven is extinguished." Gao You's note: "Temptation, feeling also."
humanum_short_description_en: From " speak " to " show " sound. " Trap " means to lure and guide.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「秀」聲。《說文》以「誘」為「㕗」的或體。《說文》：「㕗，相訹呼也。从厶从羑。誘，或从言、秀。䛻，或如此。羑，古文。」孟蓬生以為「㕗」表示引誘，當是「誘」的假借字；《說文》以「㕗」為引誘之「誘」的本字，不一定可靠。（參《字源》）

　　「誘」表示引誘、誘惑。如《左傳．昭公二十年》：「華亥偽有疾，以誘群公子。」銀雀山漢簡《孫臏兵法．八陣》簡340：「適（敵）強以治，先其下卒以誘之。」

　　「誘」也表示引導、誘導。《爾雅．釋詁下》：「誘，進也。」《玉篇．言部》：「誘，引也，相勸動也。」如《尚書．大誥》：「肆予大化，誘我友邦君。」孔傳：「故大化天下，道我友國諸侯。」《論語．子罕》：「夫子循循然善誘人，博我以文，約我以禮，欲罷不能。」

　　「誘」還表示感動。如《淮南子．原道》：「好憎成形，而知誘於外，不能反己，而天理滅矣。」高誘注：「誘，感也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「秀」聲。「誘」表示引誘、引導。

從「 言 」，「 秀 」聲。《說文》以「 誘 」為「 㕗 」的或體。《說文》：「㕗，相訹呼也。从厶从羑。誘，或从言、秀。䛻，或如此。羑，古文。」孟蓬生以為「 㕗 」表示引誘，當是「 誘 」的假借字；《說文》以「 㕗 」為引誘之「 誘 」的本字，不一定可靠。（參《字源》） 「 誘 」表示引誘、誘惑。如《左傳．昭公二十年》：「華亥偽有疾，以誘群公子。」銀雀山漢簡《孫臏兵法．八陣》簡340：「適（敵）強以治，先其下卒以誘之。」 「 誘 」也表示引導、誘導。《爾雅．釋詁下》：「誘，進也。」《玉篇．言部》：「誘，引也，相勸動也。」如《尚書．大誥》：「肆予大化，誘我友邦君。」孔傳：「故大化天下，道我友國諸侯。」《論語．子罕》：「夫子循循然善誘人，博我以文，約我以禮，欲罷不能。」 「 誘 」還表示感動。如《淮南子．原道》：「好憎成形，而知誘於外，不能反己，而天理滅矣。」高誘注：「誘，感也。」

Meng Pengsheng thought that " 㕗" means inducement, which means " induction." under the guise of the word; "Wen said," in order to " 㕗" as the lure of the " lure of this word," not necessarily reliable. (Refer to "The Source of Characters") " Trap" means temptation, temptation. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Zhaogong Twenty Years": "Huahai Puppets have illnesses to lure young masters." Yinqueshan Han Bamboo Slips "Sun Bin Art of War." "Eight Formation" Jane 340: "If the (enemy) is strong, we can control it, and we must first kill it to lure it." " Lure" said the guide, induction. "Er Ya. "Shi Guxia": "Induction, enter." "Yu Pian. Yanbu: "Induces, induces, and persuades." Such as "Shangshu. Daguo": "I want to Dahua, to lure me to my friends." " Induced" also expressed touch. Such as "Huainanzi. Original Dao": "A hatred is formed, but knowing is tempted outside, not against oneself, and the law of heaven is extinguished." 誘字的基本解释

誘
yòu
见“诱”。

誘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yòu］
［《廣韻》與久切，上有，以。］
“诱1”的繁体字。
(1)诱导；教导。
(2)向导；引路。
(3)引诱；诱惑。
(4)欺诳，诱骗。
(5)感动。
(6)美善貌。
(7)自然地。

誘字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誘； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1162第15
〔古文〕羐【唐韻】與久切【集韻】【韻會】以九切【正韻】云九切，?音酉。【爾雅·釋詁】進也。又【詩·?·風衡門序】衡門，誘僖公也。【箋】進也。　又【玉篇】相勸也。【廣韻】道也。【書·大誥】肆予大化，誘我友邦君。【傳】化其固滯，誘其順從。【詩·召南】有女懷春，吉士誘之。【傳】道也。　又【廣韻】敎也。【儀禮·鄕射禮】誘射。【註】敎也。　又【說文】相訹呼也。【玉篇】誘，引也。【左傳·僖十年】卻芮曰：幣重而言甘，誘我也。【史記·越王句踐世家】吳太宰嚭貪，可誘以利。　又通作牖。【詩·大雅】天之牖民。【正義】牖與誘通。【禮·樂記】詩云：誘民孔易。【註】詩本作牖。　又叶演女切，音雨。【韓愈·元和聖德詩】有恇其凶，有餌其誘。其出穰穰，隊以萬數。數上聲。　【說文】本作?。或作䛻。【集韻】或作?。?字原从?从処作。

Name meaning

yòu
см. 诱
Radicals: 言, 禾, 乃  (say, grain, stairs)
Meaning Mnemonic
You say to some grain and some stairs: I want to invite you to my place.
So you do. You invite a stalk of grain and a set of stairs to your home.
Reading Mnemonic
You invited them to your home because your roommate was having a party and inviting a lot of youths (ゆう) over. You wanted to look cool, so you invited some grain and some stairs, the two coolest things you could think of.
Surprisingly, the youths were impressed and spent a long time trying to talk to them.
